articles.author: Elizabeth Byrne
articles.title: Barbara Eckersley testifies she 'didn't intend' to kill her mother by feeding her animal euthanasia drugs - ABC News
articles.description: Barbara Eckersley tells a court that she was shocked to be charged with the murder of her mother after she went to police to tell them she may have had a hand in her death.
articles.content:
A woman on trial for killing her mother has told the New South Wales Supreme Court how she tipped so-called 'green dream' veterinary drugs into the 92-year-old's soup, just hours before she died.

articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Seven Malaysian youth made it to Forbes' "30 under 30 Asia" Class of 2021 for being recognised as part of Asia’s top 300 trailblazers and entrepreneurs.

articles.author: Alun John
articles.title: Asian shares up on China gains but tech worries weigh - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares rose on Tuesday, led by a stronger Chinese opening and shaking off the initial drag from tech-driven Wall Street losses, while the dollar stayed at multiweek lows against other major currencies.

articles.title: Xi Jinping rebukes nations who ‘arrogantly instruct others and interfere’ - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Chinese president’s speech at Boao Forum for Asia comes amid international scrutiny of China and as US puts renewed emphasis on alliances in Asia and Europe.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: i12 Katong mall to reopen later this year with new tenants like Climb Asia and PS Cafe - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: The i12 Katong mall will reopen in the fourth quarter of this year after closing its doors for renovation in early 2020, said its operator Keppel Land on Tuesday (Apr 20).
articles.content:

articles.title: Marvel's 1st Asian superhero movie Shang-Chi finally has a trailer out now - CNA
articles.description: Watch Simu Liu, Tony Leung and Awkwafina in action as Marvel Studios drops the teaser trailer for Phase 4's Shang-Chi And The Legend Of The Ten Rings.

articles.author: Melissa Stewart
articles.title: 19-year-old Singapore tech entrepreneur named in Forbes' 30 Under 30 Asia list - CNA
articles.description: 19-year-old Harsh Dalal is the co-founder and CEO of software company Team Labs. A total of 30 Singapore-based entrepreneurs, leaders and trailblazers made the list.
